website_summaries.verdict: This well-made powerhouse is constructed to handle almost any mowing chore, and it offers the features and performance to make your job as easy as possible.
pros: A powerful machine with a Honda motor
Features AWD that makes it capable of tackling almost any terrain, including hills and slopes
cons: If you have a flat yard, an AWD model may not be necessary

customer_reviews.title: I works great and has enough power to pull you up a ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mower. I works great and has enough power to pull you up a small hill. I do not know what the complaints about making turns with 4 wheel drive being more difficult than with 2 wheel drive mowers are. The steps you do with a 4 wheel drive is no different than with a 2 wheel drive. One other thing, the cover of the drive control on the mower had a small crack. I called Husqvarna and they are shipping a replacement by FedEx. A class A company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: duffer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the all wheel drive capability since I have to mow across a slope. It holds sturdy. I also have to get the mower back up a fairly steep incline. I have no problem getting it back up up the hill and I find that it actually helps me keep my footing getting back up. The only negative I could find is that handle bars aren't adjustable. I'm a taller person, so no issues for me, but smaller people may find it uncomfortable due to the position of the bars, especially if they're mowing on a slope. Other than that, I like the accessories, it run smoothly, easy to start, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Instant start, fast cut, low effort, even on slopes. Husqvarna makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I took my time putting this together, but it was effortless. I tried it over a large area of heavy grass, and it worked great. I turned it over to my brother-in-law for the portion of our property where they live, and he says the same about starting effort and cutting performance. His hips make a push mower punishment, but he says the propulsion system takes most of the pain out of it, and he just guides it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The mower is too hard to manage for an older person to manage the AWD. The handle bar canot be adjusted for the person's height
customer_reviews.author: Howard Geiger

customer_reviews.title: What A GREAT MACHINE - LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: for over 50 years I have purchased high end yard machines for my homes and have performed well as expected but, nothing has ever come close to the performance, power and maneuverability than this self propelled Husqvarna LC221H...WOW what a machine, but don't take my word and try it for yourself and you will certainly agree
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy A bit heavy but 4 wheel drive is exceptionally good
customer_reviews.author: Jon B. Snellikng

customer_reviews.title: Great for hilly yard!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. The four wheel drive will pull the mower up the hill with little help from you pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Only thing is it makes me walk a little fast when I squeeze the handle 🤗
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: A joy to use on hilly terraced yards!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! All wheel drive and big wheels in back make this well designed mower a joy to use even on steep hills! Also, when putting it away I can easily move up and down stairs thanks to the large rear wheels! After using this, I just gave my goog old "easy walk" mower away for free!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jansen-Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best mower i have ever owned and i have owned many.
customer_reviews.author: Red Crow

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a single rear wheel drive much better for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dan Toney

customer_reviews.title: Rewind starter broke after only being used just 4 times
customer_reviews.text: I love this mower with the exception of after only the 4th time starting it the rewind starter broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mower!
customer_reviews.text: Best mower I've ever owned! Always starts on the first or second pull, easy height adjustment and cleanup...maintenance is a breeze! Extremely well built!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rear discharge
customer_reviews.text: The Rear discharge is so nice! it never clogs up. it is easy to use and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Came partially assembled and delivered to my door
customer_reviews.text: I use it for cutting my lawn. Started on the second pull!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ciotta

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Item broke within a year. Propelled tranny went out on it and they would not fix it. Bought a Honda Instead. It looked perfect next to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty weak engine
customer_reviews.text: Not enough power for what i payed for. Frame is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Random User

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy mechanical engineer.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable pulling. Hats off to Husqvarna for a complete mower.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: the vent had sucked so much dirt into the gas tank that the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly designed mower. The gas tank is vented directly into the air filter housing, which is the highest concentration of dirt on the mower. After only 10 hours of use, the vent had sucked so much dirt into the gas tank that the engine would no longer run. Husqvarna's warranty bears a convenient loophole which excludes any "fuel related" problems. Although less than a year old, the repair cost me $128.00. Furthermore, Husqvarna offers no apparent method by which to contact their "customer service" department. Such was my experience with a mower from the (self-proclaimed) Global Leader in Outdoor Power Equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Gravis Armaturae

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - died on first use
customer_reviews.text: Trust all the 1-star reviews here and elsewhere. The self-propel feature quit working the very first time I used the mower, and after I turned it over to check the belt and righted it, it wouldn't even start again. But that's not all that's bad about this mower. The side discharge is a joke, clogging multiple times on the three-quarters of a mow I got done. And the door that gives you access to clean it out opens up a huge hole right to the blade - incredibly hazardous. Get a Toro.
customer_reviews.author: dmd

customer_reviews.title: a pain to keep undercarriage and front transmission clean of debris
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mower for 2 years and I've had to change out the belt twice. I have a flat lot with grass and weeds that doesn't get over 4". This mower is powerful awd, however trying to get the undercarriage and the front axel and tranny clean takes A LOT OF EFFORT. Mowing was easy, cleaning was exhausting. The design is very poor. Cuttings get everywhere inside the mower, and that is not optimal at all. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Welborn

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mower for my wife. She loved this mower then the mower blew smoke and quit going. I returned it a nd got one just like it and the same thing happened again. I always check the oil everything looked fine. It's too bad, this was a nice mower when it ran.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Burrell

customer_reviews.title: front wheel locks sometimes
customer_reviews.text: AWD is great no issues other than front wheels lock up occasionally and never had to pull the starter cord more than twice
customer_reviews.author: James A Lewis

product_meta.title: Husqvarna LC221AH, 21 in 163cc Briggs & Stratton Walk Behind Mower
product_meta.description: Husqvarna all wheel drive mower allows the user to easily handle hills, thick grass and tough terrain
feature_bullets: 21-in Premier Cut provides superior lift for manicured professional looking results
Featuring 2-pull starting promise with a powerful 163-cc Briggs & Stratton Ready Start engine for easy and reliable starts
Just Check & Add easy y-to-maintain engine allows you to never change the engine oil
Dual Trigger Drive activation allows convenient variable speed control with either hand
11-in high, rear ball-bearing wheels ensure smooth operation and maneuverability; Ideal for medium to large size yards with hilly, uneven terrain and other tough mowing conditions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
